snippet: Sprint Nextel is selling a 70 percent stake to SoftBank of Japan. | Bank earnings continue with Citigroup. | Two Americans are awarded the Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences. | The A.C.L.U. is taking aim at Morgan Stanley's mortgage machine.
